title: What you can donwload
text:
Home » technology » What you can donwload What you can donwload October 14, 2015 1:57 pm 
Lazada iPick iPick is a free app that helps you discover the best culinary destinations in your city. Find new local favourites through friends and community experts you trust. Also iPick's sleek interface, lack of pop-up ads and smart search engine help you find exactly what you're looking for. You can share pics and reviews with your network via WeChat and Facebook. You can also plan a get-together using iPick's invite feature. Lazada This app has been redesigned with customer experience and convenience in mind. It is now easier to discover new products thanks to category tabs, which strategically sort the needs of the user. A brand tab has also been added for those looking for specific brands. Lazada is also offering more exciting products, flash sales, deals of the day and special offers. With the app, users will receive notifications directly on their smartphones so they never miss a deal on their favourite products. The order status function has also been improved to help customers track and manage orders. Shopee Thailand The Shopee Thailand app opens the door to consumer-to-consumer e-commerce via smartphone. Sellers just need to download the app, sign up and post the product they wish to sell, while buyers can download the app and search for their favourite item before buying it. So far, the app has been downloaded a million times and 500,000 items across 20 categories are available for sale. 322 Viewed
